twoStepCheckout.title: Enable Two-Step Checkout
twoStepCheckout.description: Separate order creation and payment steps. Shows two buttons: "Create Order" and "Proceed to Payment". Useful when you want to send orders to kitchen before collecting payment.
twoStepCheckout.cannotDisableWithCustomerOrdering: Cannot disable two-step checkout while QR menu customer ordering is active. Please disable customer ordering first.

requireServedForDineInPayment.title: Require Served for Dine-In Payment
requireServedForDineInPayment.description: When enabled, payment button is only active for dine-in orders after food is served. Does not affect takeaway or delivery orders.

info.noteBody: Changes will take effect immediately in the POS system. Make sure staff are informed of any operational changes.

showProductImages.title: Show Product Images
showProductImages.description: Display product images in the POS menu. When disabled, only product names and prices will be shown.

enableCustomerOrdering.title: Enable Customer Ordering from QR Menu
enableCustomerOrdering.description: Allow customers to place orders directly from the QR menu. When disabled, customers can view the menu but must contact staff to place orders. They can still call the waiter or request the bill.
